title: Nightly Two-Rak'ah Prayer
description: A recommended two-unit prayer to be performed every night of Ramadan, involving the recitation of Surah al-Ikhlas three times, followed by specific glorifications (Tasbih) for the forgiveness of sins.

phrases.arabic: يستحبّ في كلّ ليلة صلاة ركعتين تقرأ في كلّ ركعة
phrases.english: It is recommended to perform a two-unit prayer every night, reciting in each unit...
phrases.transliteration: Yustahabbu fī kulli laylatin ṣalātu rak‘atayn taqra’u fī kulli rak‘ah.

phrases.english: Three times. Then, when you have offered the salutations, you shall say:

phrases.arabic: سُبْحانَ مَنْ هُوَ حَفيظٌ لا يَغْفُلُ،
phrases.english: Glory be to Him Who is the All-Preserving and never heedless.
phrases.transliteration: Subḥāna man huwa ḥafīẓun lā yaghfulu.

phrases.arabic: سُبحانَ مَنْ هُوَ رَحيمٌ لا يَعْجَلُ،
phrases.english: Glory be to Him Who is Merciful and does not hasten.
phrases.transliteration: Subḥāna man huwa raḥīmun lā ya‘jalu,

phrases.arabic: سُبْحانَ مَنْ هُوَ قآئِمٌ لا يَسْهُو،
phrases.english: Glory be to Him Who is Ever-Watchful and never forgets.
phrases.transliteration: Subḥāna man huwa qā’imun lā yas-hū.

phrases.arabic: سُبْحانَ مَنْ هُوَ دائِمٌ لا يَلْهُو.
phrases.english: Glory be to Him Who is Everlasting and never heedless.
phrases.transliteration: Subḥāna man huwa dā’imun lā yalhū.

phrases.arabic: ثمّ تسبّح بالتسبيحات الأربعة سبع مرّات ثمّ تقول:
phrases.english: Then glorify Allah with the Fourfold Glorification seven times, and then say:
phrases.transliteration: Thumma tusabbihu bi-t-tasbīḥāti al-arbaʿati sabʿa marrātin thumma taqūl:

phrases.english: Glory be to You, Glory be to You, Glory be to You.

phrases.arabic: يا عَظيمُ اغْفِرْ لِىَ الذَّنْبَ الْعَظيمَ.
phrases.english: O Magnificent One, forgive for me the great sin.
phrases.transliteration: Yā ʿAẓīmu ighfir liya adh-dhanba al-ʿaẓīm.

phrases.arabic: ثمّ تصلّي على النّبيِّ وآلِه عَشْرَ مرّات.
phrases.english: Then invoke blessings upon the Prophet and his progeny ten times.
phrases.transliteration: Thumma tuṣallī ʿalā an-nabiyyi wa-ālihī ʿashra marrāt.

phrases.arabic: من صلّى هذه الصلاة غفر اللَّه له ذنوباً كثيرة
phrases.english: Whoever performs this prayer, Allah shall forgive their numerous sins.
phrases.transliteration: Man ṣallā hādhihi al-ṣalāh ghafara Allāhu lahu dhunūban kathīrah
